meanings.definition: A type of small marine mollusk with a thin, transparent shell.
meanings.sent1: The pteropods gracefully swam through the ocean waters.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the ecosystem impact of pteropods in the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The pteropods decided to have a race to see who could swim the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The pteropods shimmered like delicate jewels in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: Children were fascinated by the pteropods' delicate shells.

meanings.definition: Any member of the group Pteropoda, which includes sea snails and sea butterflies.
meanings.sent1: We observed a variety of pteropods during our marine biology field trip.
meanings.sent2: The aquarium had a special exhibit featuring different species of pteropods.
meanings.sent3: The pteropods threw a surprise party for the sea snails and sea butterflies.
meanings.sent4: In the world of marine creatures, pteropods are the elegant dancers.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the pteropods captivated the underwater explorers.
